name: The Yes Button Lite
description:
Do you like simple decisions? When you play The Yes Button Lite, you make one simple decision. Press The Yes Button, or don't press The Yes Button.

You have 4 seconds. You are asked a yes or no question. To answer yes, press The Yes Button. To answer no, just let the time run out. You get a point for every correct answer and a strike for every wrong answer. Your third strike ends the game. How high can you score?

The Yes Button Lite will give you a taste of this easy and entertaining trivia game. The full version has ten times the content.
